description: With these stylish climbing pants from the Hueco family, you’ll look good on your way to the climbing gym too. The resistant and abrasion-proof fabric makes the Hueco Cuffed Pants particularly robust. The elasticated material ensures maximum comfort. A drawstring allows you to adjust the pants to ensure a perfect fit. The front pocket on the right is ideal for storing your smartphone and there is also a zippered pocket on the back for your keys.
name: Mammut Hueco Cuffed Pants, Reg - Mens
